thread.title: Carrie Fisher's daughter Billie Lourd and boyfriend Taylor Lautner enjoy Mexico break after tough few weeks
thread.title_full: Carrie Fisher's daughter Billie Lourd and boyfriend Taylor Lautner enjoy Mexico break after tough few weeks

author: Zoe Shenton
title: Carrie Fisher's daughter Billie Lourd and boyfriend Taylor Lautner enjoy Mexico break after tough few weeks
text:
Carrie Fisher's daughter Billie Lourd and boyfriend Taylor Lautner enjoy Mexico break after tough few weeks The Scream Queens actress and her other half are currently enjoying some R&R Share Enjoying some R&R: Billie Lourd and Taylor Lautner (Photo: Instagram) Share Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Billie Lourd and boyfriend Taylor Lautner have jetted off to sunny Mexico to enjoy a much needed break after a tough few weeks for the actress. 
Billie's mum Carrie Fisher sadly passed away after suffering a heart attack on a flight from London to Los Angeles in December. Just a day later, Billie also lost her grandmother Debbie Reynolds. 
On Friday, Twilight star Taylor shared a picture of the pair of them relaxing poolside in Cabo San Lucas, with Billie flashing two peace signs to camera. 
Taylor, who has been there to support Billie the entire time, also previously gave his other half a shout out on Instagram. https://www.instagram.com/p/BPN-naqA_jn/?taken-by=taylorlautner&hl=en/embed 
“This girl is one of the strongest, most fearless individuals I’ve ever met,” he wrote. “Absolutely beautiful inside and out. I’m lucky to know you.” 
While Billie has largely remained off social media, last week she posted a heartfelt throwback picture tribute to her late mother. https://www.instagram.com/p/BOioGsvgA9r/?taken-by=taylorlautner&hl=en/embed 
Billie shared a quote by the Star Wars actress and said that she will keep her mother's voice "forever" in her head and heart as she taught her so much. 
Alongside a picture of a young Billie in the back of a car with her mum, she wrote on Instagram: "'If my life weren't funny then it would just be true and that is unacceptable' - Finding the funny might take a while but I learned from the best and her voice will forever be in my head and in my heart (sic)" https://www.instagram.com/p/BPJmv3mlEtE/embed 
On January 6, Ithe 24-year-old beauty was joined by close family and friends - including Carrie's brother Todd Fisher and Taylor - for Carrie and Debbie's funeral. 
At the service, some of the Hollywood legend's ashes were buried alongside her mother, Debbie Reynolds - who died a day after her from a stroke, at Hollywood's Forest Lawn Memorial Park. Todd Fisher, Debbie Reynolds, Carrie Fisher and Billie Lourd (Photo: FilmMagic) 
The day before the burial, Carrie and Debbie were remembered at a private memorial at Carrie's home in Los Angeles , where Meryl Streep performed the song Happy Days Are Here Again by Ben Selvin and The Crooners. Read More Carrie Fisher and Debbie Reynolds' official cause of death confirmed - but questions still remain 
Speaking about the ceremony, a friend close to the family said: "By the end everyone was singing. 
"Billie wanted the people her mother loved to at her in that living room one last time. The only things missing were Carrie and Debbie." Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
